mapper.insert: insert into READER_EBOOK (id, creator, create_date, deleted, category_type, category_id, format, name, path, downloads) values (#{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{deleted}, #{categoryType}, #{categoryId}, #{format}, #{name}, #{path}, #{downloads})
mapper.select: select * from READER_EBOOK where deleted = '0' and category_type = #{categoryType} and category_id = #{categoryId} order by create_date desc;
select * from READER_EBOOK where deleted = '0' and creator = #{creator} order by create_date desc
